<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 404, 388, 421]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 431, 719, 446]]<|/det|>
Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 446, 320, 460]]<|/det|>
Write in dark blue or black pen.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 460, 504, 475]]<|/det|>
You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 475, 504, 490]]<|/det|>
Do not use staples, paper clips, glue or correction fluid.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 489, 383, 504]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 518, 255, 532]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 532, 653, 547]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 547, 380, 561]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 561, 885, 590]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 590, 448, 604]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 617, 604, 632]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 72, 366, 88]]<|/det|>
A shop sells pens and notebooks.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 87, 601, 104]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 117, 144, 135]]<|/det|>
<label>(a)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 117, 641, 135]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[410, 180, 608, 198]]<|/det|>

<mark>[1]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 425, 425, 443]]<|/det|> To join the diving club you must be <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[186, 457, 500, 475]]<|/det|> at least 12 years old in March 2018 <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 473, 185, 490]]<|/det|> and <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[186, 488, 440, 505]]<|/det|> at least 150 centimetres tall <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 504, 185, 521]]<|/det|> and <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[186, 520, 504, 537]]<|/det|> able to swim at least 0.5 kilometres. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 549, 608, 567]]<|/det|> Write down the names of the students who can join the club. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[384, 580, 920, 599]]<|/det|>
...................................................................................................... [2] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 612, 144, 628]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 612, 522, 628]]<|/det|> The students dive off boards of different heights. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 626, 920, 660]]<|/det|> The speed, \(s \mathrm{~m / s}\), that they enter the water from a board of height \(h\) metres, can be found using this formula. <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[453, 657, 544, 675]]<|/det|> \[s = \sqrt{19.6h}\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 689, 180, 707]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 689, 480, 707]]<|/det|> Calculate the value of \(s\) when \(h = 10\). <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[635, 734, 920, 752]]<|/det|> s = ....................................................
